name: TouchControls
tagline: This is a three.js controller which supports touch events and hit-testing.
body:
**TouchControls** =================== This is a three.js controls which supports touch events. it also has hit-testing by default which means it doesn't pass through walls or objects in the scene. I added mouse hit-testing to the example too.

#### see [**Live Demo**](http://mese79.persiangig.com/project/TouchControls/index.html) ####
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
